archimate:Folder.name: Guide Billing Events
archimate:Folder.documentation:
Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Ensures that the event records used in the billing processes are related to the correct customer billing account and subscribed products. Extended Description The Guide Billing Events processes ensure that the event records used in the billing process relate to the correct customer billing account and products. A specific event record may be related to multiple customer billing accounts and subscribed products.
Distribution of billing event records to other processes may also occur. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use. Optional Reserved for future use. Interactions Reserved for future use.
